Smalltalk YX

Smalltalk YX is an open source Smalltalk-80 implementation. It's written in C and has these purposes:

  • Readable code
  • Flexibility trough easy creations of plugins
  • Portable to most important platforms
  • Optimized
  • Modern
  • Embedding in C applications
  • Easy to use, powerful and well-structured environment
  • Small
Documented by ScaccoMatto
